modules.name: zugferd_xml
modules.script:
from lxml import etree as ET
from decimal import Decimal

# --- КОНСТАНТЫ ПРОСТРАНСТВ ИМЕН (ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНЫЕ ДЛЯ ZUGFeRD) ---
# Мы используем URI для создания элементов (ключевая особенность lxml),
# а NS_MAP для корректного отображения префиксов в финальном XML.

NS_MAP = {
    "rsm": "urn:un:unece:uncefact:data:standard:CrossIndustryInvoice:100",
    "ram": "urn:un:unece:uncefact:data:standard:ReusableAggregateBusinessInformationEntity:100",
    "udt": "urn:un:unece:uncefact:data:standard:UnqualifiedDataType:100",
    "qdt": "urn:un:unece:uncefact:data:standard:QualifiedDataType:100"
}

# Используем удобные "обертки" для URI
RAM = "{%s}" % NS_MAP["ram"]
RSM = "{%s}" % NS_MAP["rsm"]
UDT = "{%s}" % NS_MAP["udt"]
QDT = "{%s}" % NS_MAP["qdt"]

# --- ОСНОВНОЙ ГЕНЕРАТОР XML ---
def generate_zugferd_xml(
    invoice_header: dict,
    seller: dict,
    buyer: dict,
    currency: dict,
    seller_bank_account: dict,
    invoice_lines: list,
    vat_breakdown: list,
):
    """
    Генерирует XML ZUGFeRD 2.1 (Basic Profile) из подготовленных данных.

    :param invoice_header: Данные заголовка счета.
    :param seller: Данные продавца (parties).
    :param buyer: Данные покупателя (parties).
    :param currency: Данные валюты (currencies).
    :param seller_bank_account: Банковские реквизиты продавца (bank_accounts).
    :param invoice_lines: Список позиций счета (invoice_lines).
    :param vat_breakdown: Список агрегированных сумм НДС (vat_breakdown).
    :return: Строка с форматированным XML.
    """
    # --- ВСПОМОГАТЕЛЬНАЯ ФУНКЦИЯ ДЛЯ ТЕКСТОВЫХ ПОЛЕЙ ---
    def _add_text_element(parent, tag_name, text_value):
        """Создает дочерний элемент и присваивает ему текст."""
        if text_value is not None:
            elem = ET.SubElement(parent, tag_name)
            elem.text = str(text_value)
            return elem
    
    # 1. Корневой элемент CrossIndustryInvoice
    root = ET.Element(RSM + "CrossIndustryInvoice", nsmap=NS_MAP)
    
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # 1. ExchangedDocumentContext (Контекст документа)
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    context = ET.SubElement(root, RSM + "ExchangedDocumentContext")
    
    # 1.1. BusinessProcessSpecifiedDocumentContextParameter (ID процесса - опционально)
    # В ZUGFeRD/XRechnung часто используется для указания формата (Profile)
    bus_proc = ET.SubElement(context, RAM + "BusinessProcessSpecifiedDocumentContextParameter")
    # Используем рекомендованный ID для профиля BASIC
    _add_text_element(bus_proc, RAM + "ID", "urn:factur-x.eu:1p0:basic") 
    
    # 1.2. GuidelineSpecifiedDocumentContextParameter (ID правила/стандарта)
    # Это обязательный элемент для указания, что документ соответствует EN16931
    spec_doc = ET.SubElement(context, RAM + "GuidelineSpecifiedDocumentContextParameter")
    # ID указывает на соответствие EN16931 и профилю BASIC
    _add_text_element(spec_doc, RAM + "ID", "urn:cen.eu:en16931:2017#compliant#urn:factur-x.eu:1p0:basic")

    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # 2. ExchangedDocument (Общие данные)
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    doc = ET.SubElement(root, RSM + "ExchangedDocument")
    _add_text_element(doc, RAM + "ID", invoice_header["invoice_number"])
    
    # 1. TypeCode (должен идти вторым)
    _add_text_element(doc, RAM + "TypeCode", "380") 

    # 2. IssueDateTime (должен идти третьим)
    issue_date_time = ET.SubElement(doc, RAM + "IssueDateTime")
    date_str = invoice_header["invoice_date"].replace('-', '') 
    date_string = ET.SubElement(issue_date_time, UDT + "DateTimeString", format="102")
    date_string.text = date_str


    if invoice_header.get("initial_note"):
        note1 = ET.SubElement(doc, RAM + "IncludedNote")
        ET.SubElement(note1, RAM + "Content").text = invoice_header["initial_note"]

    if invoice_header.get("closing_note"):
        note2 = ET.SubElement(doc, RAM + "IncludedNote")
        ET.SubElement(note2, RAM + "Content").text = invoice_header["closing_note"]


    # 3. LanguageID
    _add_text_element(doc, RAM + "LanguageID", "deu")

    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # B. SupplyChainTradeTransaction
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    transaction = ET.SubElement(root, RSM + "SupplyChainTradeTransaction")

    # B.1. Line Items (Позиции Счета)
    for line in invoice_lines:
        line_item = ET.SubElement(transaction, RAM + "IncludedSupplyChainTradeLineItem")
        
        # Line Document (Номер позиции)
        doc_line = ET.SubElement(line_item, RAM + "AssociatedDocumentLineDocument")
        _add_text_element(doc_line, RAM + "LineID", line["line_number"])
        
        # Product (Товар/Услуга)
        product = ET.SubElement(line_item, RAM + "SpecifiedTradeProduct")
        _add_text_element(product, RAM + "Name", line["name"])
        _add_text_element(product, RAM + "Description", line["description"])
        # SKU
        # product_id = self.db_data.get_record("products", f"pid={line['product_id']}") # Если нужно получить SKU
        # _add_text_element(product, RAM + "SellerAssignedID", product_id['sku']) 
        
        # Trade Delivery (Количество)
        trade_delivery = ET.SubElement(line_item, RAM + "SpecifiedLineTradeDelivery")
        
        # Billed Quantity (Количество и Единица Измерения)
        unit_code = line.get("unit_code", "PCE")
        billed_qty = ET.SubElement(trade_delivery, RAM + "BilledQuantity", unitCode=unit_code)
        # Округление количества до 4 знаков после запятой
        billed_qty.text = "{:.4f}".format(Decimal(line["quantity"]))
        
        # Trade Settlement (Расчеты по позиции)
        trade_settlement = ET.SubElement(line_item, RAM + "SpecifiedLineTradeSettlement")

        # 1. Tax (НДС по позиции) - ИСПОЛЬЗУЕМ ApplicableTradeTax
        tax = ET.SubElement(trade_settlement, RAM + "ApplicableTradeTax") 
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "TypeCode", "VAT")
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "CategoryCode", "S") # Standard
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "RateApplicablePercent", "{:.2f}".format(Decimal(line["vat_rate"])))
            
        # 2. Monetary Summation (Сумма по позиции) - ИСПОЛЬЗУЕМ SpecifiedTradeSettlementLineMonetarySummation
        monetary_sum = ET.SubElement(trade_settlement, RAM + "SpecifiedTradeSettlementLineMonetarySummation")
        # Округление до 2 знаков после запятой
        _add_text_element(monetary_sum, RAM + "LineTotalAmount", "{:.2f}".format(Decimal(line["net_line_total"])))

    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # C. ApplicableHeaderTradeAgreement (Соглашение)
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    agreement = ET.SubElement(transaction, RAM + "ApplicableHeaderTradeAgreement")
    
    # Seller (Продавец)
    seller_party = ET.SubElement(agreement, RAM + "SellerTradeParty")
    _add_text_element(seller_party, RAM + "Name", seller["name"])
    
    seller_addr = ET.SubElement(seller_party, RAM + "PostalTradeAddress")
    _add_text_element(seller_addr, RAM + "PostcodeCode", seller["postal_code"])
    _add_text_element(seller_addr, RAM + "LineOne", seller["street"])
    _add_text_element(seller_addr, RAM + "CityName", seller["city"])
    _add_text_element(seller_addr, RAM + "CountryID", seller["country_code"])
    
    # Buyer (Покупатель)
    buyer_party = ET.SubElement(agreement, RAM + "BuyerTradeParty")
    _add_text_element(buyer_party, RAM + "Name", buyer["name"])

    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # D. ApplicableHeaderTradeDelivery (Дата поставки)
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    trade_delivery = ET.SubElement(transaction, RAM + "ApplicableHeaderTradeDelivery")
    delivery_event = ET.SubElement(trade_delivery, RAM + "ActualDeliverySupplyChainEvent")
    
    occurrence_date = ET.SubElement(delivery_event, RAM + "OccurrenceDateTime")
    delivery_date_str = invoice_header["delivery_date"].replace('-', '')
    date_string = ET.SubElement(occurrence_date, UDT + "DateTimeString", format="102")
    date_string.text = delivery_date_str

    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # E. ApplicableHeaderTradeSettlement (Расчеты)
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    settlement = ET.SubElement(transaction, RAM + "ApplicableHeaderTradeSettlement")
    _add_text_element(settlement, RAM + "InvoiceCurrencyCode", currency["iso_code"])

    # E.2. Payment Means (Банковские реквизиты продавца)
    payment_means = ET.SubElement(settlement, RAM + "SpecifiedTradeSettlementPaymentMeans")
    _add_text_element(payment_means, RAM + "TypeCode", "30") # 30 = Credit Transfer

    
    # E.1. VAT Breakdown (Разбивка НДС)
    for vat_item in vat_breakdown:
        tax = ET.SubElement(settlement, RAM + "ApplicableTradeTax")
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "CalculatedAmount", "{:.2f}".format(Decimal(vat_item["tax_amount"])))
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "TypeCode", "VAT")
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "BasisAmount", "{:.2f}".format(Decimal(vat_item["tax_base_amount"])))
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "CategoryCode", "S") # Standard
        _add_text_element(tax, RAM + "RateApplicablePercent", "{:.2f}".format(Decimal(vat_item["vat_rate"])))
        
    
    # IBAN
    account = ET.SubElement(payment_means, RAM + "PayeePartyCreditorFinancialAccount")
    _add_text_element(account, RAM + "IBANID", seller_bank_account["iban"])
    
    # BIC
    institution = ET.SubElement(payment_means, RAM + "PayeeSpecifiedCreditorFinancialInstitution")
    _add_text_element(institution, RAM + "BICID", seller_bank_account["bic_swift"])


    # E.4. Payment Terms (Условия оплаты)
    terms = ET.SubElement(settlement, RAM + "SpecifiedTradePaymentTerms")
    
    # E.3. Monetary Summation (Итоговые суммы)
    monetary_sum = ET.SubElement(settlement, RAM + "SpecifiedTradeSettlementHeaderMonetarySummation")
    
    # Округление до 2 знаков после запятой
    net_amount = Decimal(invoice_header["net_amount"])
    tax_total = Decimal(invoice_header["gross_amount"]) - net_amount
    gross_amount = Decimal(invoice_header["gross_amount"])
    
    _add_text_element(monetary_sum, RAM + "LineTotalAmount", "{:.2f}".format(net_amount))
    _add_text_element(monetary_sum, RAM + "TaxBasisTotalAmount", "{:.2f}".format(net_amount))
    _add_text_element(monetary_sum, RAM + "TaxTotalAmount", "{:.2f}".format(tax_total))
    _add_text_element(monetary_sum, RAM + "GrandTotalAmount", "{:.2f}".format(gross_amount))

    
    # Оплата нетто (срок оплаты)
    payment_base_text = f'Zahlungsziel: {invoice_header["payment_terms_days"]} Tage netto.'
    
    # Условия Skonto (если применимо)
    if Decimal(invoice_header.get("skonto_rate", 0)) > 0:
        skonto_text = (
            f' 3% Skonto bei Zahlung bis zum {invoice_header["skonto_due_date"]}.'
        )
        payment_base_text += skonto_text

    _add_text_element(terms, RAM + "Description", payment_base_text)
    
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    # 3. Финализация и вывод
    # ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    # Преобразуем дерево в строку с красивым форматированием
    zu = ET.tostring(root, pretty_print=True, encoding="UTF-8", xml_declaration=True).decode('utf-8')
    return zu



def get_zugferd_invoice(id):
    invoice_header = get("invoices", ["id=%s", id])
    seller = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["seller_id"]])
    buyer = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["buyer_id"]])
    currency = get("currencies", ["cid=%s", invoice_header["currency_id"]])
    seller_id = invoice_header['seller_id']
    seller_bank_account = get("bank_accounts", f"party_id={seller_id} order by default_account desc")
    invoice_lines = q2cursor(f"""    select invoice_lines.*, unit_codes.code as unit_code
                                                from invoice_lines 
                                                left join unit_codes on unit_codes.uid = invoice_lines.unit_id
                                                where invoice_id={id} 
                                                order by line_number
                                           """).get_rows()
    vat_breakdown = q2cursor(f"select * from vat_breakdown where invoice_id={id} order by vat_rate").get_rows()
    
    
    zugferd_data = {
        "invoice_header": invoice_header,
        "seller": seller,
        "buyer":buyer,
        "currency":currency,
        "seller_bank_account": seller_bank_account,
        "invoice_lines": invoice_lines,
        "vat_breakdown":vat_breakdown
    }
    ?zugferd_data
    
    zu = generate_zugferd_xml(invoice_header, seller, buyer , currency,
        seller_bank_account, invoice_lines, vat_breakdown)
    return zu

if __name__ == "__main__":
    ?get_zugferd_invoice(1)

modules.name: zugferd_xml.
modules.script:
def get_zugferd_xml(id):
    from q2zugferd import q2zugferd_xml
    
    invoice_header = get("invoices", ["id=%s", id])
    seller = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["seller_id"]])
    buyer = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["buyer_id"]])
    currency = get("currencies", ["cid=%s", invoice_header["currency_id"]])
    seller_id = invoice_header['seller_id']
    seller_bank_account = get("bank_accounts", f"party_id={seller_id} order by default_account desc")
    invoice_lines = q2cursor(f"""    select invoice_lines.*, unit_codes.code as unit_code
                                                from invoice_lines 
                                                left join unit_codes on unit_codes.uid = invoice_lines.unit_id
                                                where invoice_id={id} 
                                                order by line_number
                                           """).get_rows()
    vat_breakdown = q2cursor(f"select * from vat_breakdown where invoice_id={id} order by vat_rate").get_rows()
    
    zugferd_data = {
        "invoice_header": invoice_header,
        "seller": seller,
        "buyer":buyer,
        "currency":currency,
        "seller_bank_account": seller_bank_account,
        "invoice_lines": invoice_lines,
        "vat_breakdown":vat_breakdown
    }
    
    zu = q2zugferd_xml(zugferd_data)
    return zu

modules.name: zugferd_utils
modules.script:
def get_zugferd_xml(id):
    from q2zugferd import q2zugferd_xml
    
    invoice_header = get("invoices", ["id=%s", id])
    seller = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["seller_id"]])
    buyer = get("parties", ["pid=%s", invoice_header["buyer_id"]])
    currency = get("currencies", ["cid=%s", invoice_header["currency_id"]])
    seller_id = invoice_header['seller_id']
    seller_bank_account = get("bank_accounts", f"party_id={seller_id} order by default_account desc")
    invoice_lines = q2cursor(f"""    select invoice_lines.*, unit_codes.code as unit_code
                                                from invoice_lines 
                                                left join unit_codes on unit_codes.uid = invoice_lines.unit_id
                                                where invoice_id={id} 
                                                order by line_number
                                           """).get_rows()
    vat_breakdown = q2cursor(f"select * from vat_breakdown where invoice_id={id} order by vat_rate").get_rows()
    
    zugferd_data = {
        "invoice_header": invoice_header,
        "seller": seller,
        "buyer":buyer,
        "currency":currency,
        "seller_bank_account": seller_bank_account,
        "invoice_lines": invoice_lines,
        "vat_breakdown":vat_breakdown
    }
    
    zu = q2zugferd_xml(zugferd_data)
    return zu

modules.name: manifest
modules.script:
myapp.app_title = "q2-REchnungen"
myapp.app_description = """q2-REchnungen ist ein leistungsstarkes Tool zur einfachen 
und professionellen Erstellung von Rechnungen.
Die Anwendung unterstützt den gesamten Prozess – von der Vorbereitung 
der Daten bis zur Ausgabe in verschiedenen Formaten wie PDF, DOCX, XLSX und HTML.
Zusätzlich bietet q2-Rechnungen eine vollständige Unterstützung des elektronischen 
Rechnungsstandards ZUGFeRD, sodass Sie rechtssichere und strukturierte Rechnungen erstellen können."""
self.app_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreiPuchko/q2market/main/q2re"

forms.name: invoices
forms.title: Rechnungen
forms.after_form_load:
def recalc_vat_breakdown(mem=mem):
    sql = f"""
                    select vat_rate
                        , invoice_id
                        , sum(net_total) as tax_base_amount
                        , sum(vat_total) as tax_amount
                        
                    from invoice_lines 
                    where invoice_id = {mem.r.id}
                    group by vat_rate
                """
    cu = q2cursor(sql)
    cu2 = q2cursor(f"""select 
                                    max(invoice_id) as id
                                    , sum(tax_base_amount) as net_amount
                                    , sum(tax_base_amount+tax_amount) as gross_amount
                            from ({sql}) qq
                            """)
    transaction()
    
    update("invoices", cu2.get_record(0))
    delete("vat_breakdown", {"invoice_id": mem.r.id})
    for x in cu.records():
        insert("vat_breakdown", x)
    commit()
    
    mem.refresh()

mem.heap.recalc_vat_breakdown = recalc_vat_breakdown

mem.s.gross_total = num(mem.s.net_total) + num(mem.s.vat_total)

actions.name: invoices
actions.action_worker:
from q2zugferd import q2zugferd_pdf
import zugferd_utils

xml =  get_zugferd_xml(mem.r.id)


import os
import re

def rename_to_zugferd(path: str) -> str:
    """
    Заменяет буквы перед числовой частью имени файла на 'zugferd',
    сохраняя цифры (если есть) и расширение.
    """
    dir_name, base_name = os.path.split(path)
    name, ext = os.path.splitext(base_name)
    # Заменяем только имя, не трогаем расширение
    new_name = re.sub(r"([a-zA-Z]+)(\d*)", r"zugferd\2", name)
    return os.path.join(dir_name, new_name + ext)
    

rep = get_report("Invoice-1")
if rep:
    rep.params["id"] = mem.r.id
    pdf_path = rep.run("PDF", open_output_file=0)
    new_filename = rename_to_zugferd(pdf_path )
    q2zugferd_pdf(pdf_path ,   xml, new_filename)
    open_document(new_filename)
